H0.text: element named after fictional planet from which superman came. Promethium

H1.text: element named after fictional planet from which superman came. Barium

H2.text: element named after fictional planet from which superman came. Radium

H3.text: element named after fictional planet from which superman came. Kryptonite

A5.text: Promethium is derived from Prometheus, the Titan in Greek mythology who stole fire from Mount Olympus and brought it down to humans.

A6.text: The name barium originates from the alchemical derivative 'baryta' from Greek βαρὺς (barys), meaning 'heavy'.

A7.text: Radium is named from the Latin 'radius' (ray) due to its emission of energy in the form of rays.
